name: Awkward Conversation in an Elevator Simulator 2020
name_original: Awkward Conversation in an Elevator Simulator 2020
description:
You feel like you've been stuck in this elevator for hours. Your mind starts to wander...How long will this elevator take? Have you got something in your teeth? Has life always been this terrible? 

Oh god, there's a guy in the elevator. You've got to make a good impression. What are you going to do?

A darkly comic interactive fiction piece where you get to experience an existential life crisis in the first person! 

Written and created by Jacob Welby
